name: Tap Slime
description:
Download APK for full experience !

In this one button game, you play a slime who wants to climb a tree.

Collect gold to unlock skins  and complete all the missions !

All the audio was made by Delta Element.

An unpretentious game created by Romain.

This project was made for the Game Design module by Lou Trillot at YNOV CAMPUS Bordeaux.
